PlanetShine does not depend on toolbar, it only uses it optionally to provide a settings menu. However you can still change the settings by editing the file "Settings.cfg".

I understand that some people need to have access to the settings in-game because the want to change the ambient light often (for making videos or other stuff).

Please be patient, I will work on releasing a new version soon.
